</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return velocity (speed vector) of [[Object#Unit|Unit]] as an array with format [x, y, z].
<template lineStart="1"><title>Important</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Units are in metres per second.</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>Description</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[velocity]] vehicleName </value></part><part><name>Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicleName: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>Parameter 1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>Return value</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_vector = [[velocity]] jeep;</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] (([[velocity]] _plane1 [[select]] 2) > 50) [[then]] { [[hint]] "Aircraft is climbing up too fast!"; };</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>  [[setVelocity]], [[velocityModelSpace]], [[setVelocityModelSpace]], [[setVelocityTransformation]], [[speed]] </value></part><part><name>See also</name>=<value>
